fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Astral Vulture's Crimson Plumage__
Signature and best-in-slot option.
__Song of Stillness__
Fontaine craftable and best free weapon.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Aqua Simulacra, The First Great Magic__
Great 5 star options to replace her signature.
__Chain Breaker, Hamayumi, Ibis Piercer__
Craftable and Event bows that are not as good as the Fontaine craftable, but are viable alternatives.
__Range Guage, Scion of The Blazing Sun, Skyward Harp, Flower-Wreathed__
Other wish-based alternatives.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% of Elemental Mastery|<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Spirit Reins, Shadow Hunt
**2)** Elemental Burst: Soul Reaper's Fatal Round
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Phantom Feather Flurry

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If using Obsidian Codex or Marechaussee Hunter, CRIT Rate is extremely easy to overcap, (especially with her Ascension Stat being CRIT Rate), making CRIT Rate circlets or weapons less recommended.
Marechaussee Hunter is not recommended in teams without Furina.
